name: @penumbra-zone/wasm
description: Penumbra WASM modules for accelerated transactions

scripts.dev: cargo watch -C ./crate --postpone -- pnpm turbo run compile
scripts.compile: cd crate ; wasm-pack build --no-pack --target bundler --out-name index --out-dir ../wasm
scripts.test:rust: cd crate ; wasm-pack test --headless --firefox -- --test build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release --features 'mock-database'
